review_title: I like it. It's warm and soft.
reviews:
It's warm, soft and comfortable.

I was curious about the size due to other reviews. Thought I might need to get an XL because dudes were saying in the reviews that the large seemed to fit small. I took a chance on the large and it's quite big on me. I'm a relatively fit 210 lbs and 6'0" tall... Usually I'm about 170 lbs and would've probably taken a chance on a medium according to the reviews.. Maybe they fixed the sizing issue since those reviews? Otherwise those other dudes saying the large fits small make no sense.

Cuffs are a bit tight. Large watches wont fit under them. Need to put the watch on after the shirt. Can't really roll up the cuffs unless you want to expose the black inner lining instead of showing the plaid cuff as it's meant to appear... [and since the cuffs are tight, rolling them up is a chore]...

Straight out of the package, the buttons are a tight fit to slip through the hole slits. I guess they loosen up just enough with use that this is not an issue. Basically a perfect fit to push through the holes.

The other one with the hood is like a jacket. It has a thicker / quilted inner lining. I've gotten away with wearing only that, even in cold weather. This one is warm but not much of a jacket. Just a thick, soft shirt.

Overall, good look. Lady loves it. I like wearing it. It's appealing.

review_title: Cozy and Comfortable - Made in Bangladesh

First off - I am keeping this shirt. It feels great and comfy and is in-between feeling like a very lightweight jacket or a heavy(ish) shirt. Definitely not a "tuck-in to pants" type of shirt in my opinion. If you look at pics I posted you will see that this is made in Bangladesh not the USA so I am unsure of how "authentic" it is...
I am 6'2" and weigh 185 lbs. My shoulders are very broad + 50" and I have a 34 waist (very V-Shaped). I am used to having trouble finding shirts that are not either are too tight around chest/shoulders or way too lose around waist and stomach. This I will wear more like a jacket. It will be great for those fall early winter days over a t-shirt. It is too thick and bulky for me to ever tuck into my pant - but I only tuck in dress shirts and undershirts anyways.
I also had no problems with doing up or undoing buttons. My hands are large and my wrists are normal size. I can put the shirt on without undoing the cuff buttons.
Hope this review helps in your online purchase decision! I miss the days of walking into a store and just trying stuff on... se la vie.
